content: I had a dream. Would moving deprecated/unstable items in their own subsection (in the table of contents on the left when looking at methods for example) be possible ?
Since the survey is coming, we could ask users if they would like that ?

I don't think the survey is a good place to ask about interface changes, we'll get 20 different opinions and 90% will say "I hate anything other than the current situation". You could ask in the community discord or on users.rlo maybe.
That said I think this is a good change either way
yes, this is on my very long to-do list :P
